== Introduction ==

This is the roadmap for `sbt`.  Comments and suggestions are welcome!

== Features ==
 * Test reporting improvements
 * Parallel test running
 * Sandboxed test running/forking
 * Ability to declare expected Scala, Java version

== Documentation ==

This list describes the documentation to be done.

 * API Documentation
 * Parallel execution
 * Method tasks
 * Multi-project action behavior
 * Webstart support

== Testing ==

 * Dependency analysis
 * More testing on `FileUtilities`.
 * Contribute tests! See [ChangeDetectionAndTesting].
